data.comment: In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Mario Engels scores to make it 0-1 at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
Jeffry Fortes is replacing Sven Mijnans for the away team.
In the minute 67, Goal! Deroy Duarte extends Sparta's lead to 0-2.
That's a fine assist from Mica Pinto.
Ron Jans (Enschede) is making a first substitution, with Halil Dervisoglu replacing Vaclav Cerny.
In the minute 70, Henk Fraser is making the team's second substitution at Grolsch Veste Stadium with Reda Kharchouch replacing Mario Engels.
The home team replace Queensy Menig with Alexander Jeremejeff.
Dario Dumic is replacing Julio Pleguezuelo for Enschede at Grolsch Veste Stadium.
In the minute 80, The home team have replaced Godfried Roemeratoe with Ramiz Zerrouki. This is the fourth substitution made today by Ron Jans.
Jesse Bosch is on a sub for Luka Ilic for Enschede.
Kik Pierie (Enschede) has received a yellow card from Martin Van den Kerkhof.
In the minute 83, Sparta make their third substitution with Tom Beugelsdijk replacing Wouter Burger.
The away team have replaced Lennart Thy with Bryan Smeets. This is the fourth substitution made today by Henk Fraser.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
